column4: A fresh Start: Microsoft's Windows 10 wins plaudits
column5: Microsoft Corp's  launch of its first new operating system in almost three years  designed to work across laptops  desktop and smartphones  won mostly positive reviews for its user-friendly and feature-packed interface. | Video

column4: A fresh Start: Microsoft's Windows 10 wins plaudits
column5: Microsoft Corp's launch of its first new operating system in almost three years  designed to work across laptops  desktop and smartphones  won mostly positive reviews for its user-friendly and feature-packed interface. | Video

column4: UPDATE 2-A fresh Start: Microsoft's Windows 10 wins plaudits
column5: July 29 Microsoft Corp's launch of its first new operating system in almost three years  designed to work across laptops  desktop and smartphones  won mostly positive reviews for its user-friendly and feature-packed interface.
July 29 Microsoft Corp launched its much-awaited Windows 10 operating system at midnight on Wednesday.

column4: Alibaba cloud unit sets sights on Amazon in $1 billion global push
column5: BEIJING China's Alibaba Group Holding Ltd  said on Wednesday it would invest $1 billion into its Aliyun cloud computing arm to challenge Amazon.com Inc's  lucrative Web Services division  opening a global front in the battle between the two e-commerce giants.

column4: CORRECTED-Alibaba cloud unit sets sights on Amazon in $1 billion global push
column5: BEIJING  July 29 China's Alibaba Group Holding Ltd said on Wednesday it would invest $1 billion into its Aliyun cloud computing arm to challenge Amazon.com Inc's  lucrative Web Services division  opening a global front in the battle between the two e-commerce giants.
